description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create doors through anything they touch, including walls, the ground, and even the air itself. The user becomes a Door Human capable of accessing pocket dimensions.

users.circumstances: Blueno consumed this fruit at some point before becoming a CP9 agent

abilityReveals.description: The user turns their opponent's face into a revolving door, spinning it rapidly to disorient and confuse them.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Blueno uses this technique against Luffy during their battle on the courthouse rooftop, demonstrating one of the most creative offensive applications of his Devil Fruit.

abilityReveals.description: The user creates a door in the air itself, accessing a separate pocket dimension where they can hide, rest, or strategize during battle.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Blueno demonstrates this ability during his fight with Luffy, using it to temporarily retreat from combat and gain tactical advantages.

weaknesses.weakness: Doors automatically close after a set time period, as the user states 'if a door is opened, it must close'
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can create doors through any surface, including air, providing extreme mobility
strengths.description: The fruit allows the user to bypass physical barriers and access pocket dimensions for tactical advantages.

strengths.strength: Can turn opponents' body parts into doors for offensive purposes
strengths.description: The Kaiten Door technique shows the fruit can be used to directly attack opponents by transforming their bodies.

name.japanese: ウシウシの実 モデル:麒麟
name.romanized: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Moderu: Kirin

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a giraffe or a giraffe-human hybrid, gaining the physical attributes of the world's tallest land animal. Despite being categorized as an Ox-Ox Fruit, it grants giraffe transformation abilities.

users.circumstances: Kaku consumed this Devil Fruit when Spandam offered it to him as a reward for completing the Water 7 infiltration mission, despite not knowing what powers it would grant.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Fruit has a disgusting taste that Kaku comments on while consuming it

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate soap bubbles that can clean objects and people, both literally and figuratively. The user becomes a Soap Human with the ability to generate cleansing bubbles.

users.circumstances: Kalifa consumed this Devil Fruit when Spandam presented it to her as a reward for the successful Water 7 mission, eating it despite not knowing what powers it would provide.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Fruit tastes disgusting, as Kalifa notes while eating it
